message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I believe it's a game-changer in its industry, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can you meet me at this price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to ensure I get a fair price for it. I can offer it to you for $1800000. This is the lowest I can go, considering the product's value and my costs.
I understand that the product has value, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $1800000. Can we meet at $1400000? I'm willing to pay that price, but I think it's the upper limit for me.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price you're offering. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $1600000. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1500000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to think we're getting close to the product's true value. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I can offer it to you for $1650000. This is my final counteroffer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
